known_issues: UI regression: two elements/pages display only text and no button is visible (buttons not rendering).

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the UI regression where some pages/components display only button text (no visible button styling), ensuring buttons render with the expected padding, border/background, hover/focus states, and are clearly recognizable as buttons in both Preview and Production builds.

Add a minimal, repeatable regression check in the UI to confirm button styling is present on at least two representative screens that previously exhibited the issue (for example: the Premium page subscribe button and the RouteErrorFallback “Go to Home” button).

projectName: Fix regression where buttons render as plain text (no visible button styling)
